title: Network Perimeter Firewalls
description: Establish and implement firewall and router configuration standards to manage inbound and outbound traffic.

title: DMZ for Public Services
description: Place system components that store cardholder data in an internal network zone, segregated from the DMZ and other untrusted networks.

title: System Hardening Standards
description: Develop configuration standards for all system components, addressing all known security vulnerabilities.

title: PAN Storage Prohibition
description: Do not store sensitive authentication data after authorization (even if encrypted).

title: Cryptographic Key Protection
description: Document and implement procedures to protect cryptographic keys used for cardholder data encryption.

title: Strong Cryptography for Transmission
description: Use strong cryptography and security protocols to safeguard sensitive cardholder data during transmission over open, public networks.

title: Anti-Virus and Malware Protection
description: Ensure all anti-virus mechanisms are kept current, perform periodic scans, and generate audit logs.

title: Secure Development Training
description: Train software developers in secure coding techniques, including how to avoid common coding vulnerabilities.

title: Change Control Process
description: Implement change control processes for all system and software changes, including documentation and management approval.

title: Least Privilege Access Assignment
description: Establish an access control system that restricts access based on need-to-know and least privilege.

title: Multi-Factor Authentication
description: Secure all individual non-console administrative access and all remote access to the CDE using multi-factor authentication.

title: Password/PIN Security
description: Set passwords/phrases for user accounts to require a minimum length of 12 characters (or 8 if the system does not support 12) and include both numeric and alphabetic characters.

title: Physical Media Protection
description: Maintain strict control over the internal or external distribution of any kind of physical media containing cardholder data.

title: Audit Log Attributes
description: Implement automated audit trails for all system components to reconstruct specific events, including user identification, event type, date/time, success/failure indication, and event origin.

title: External Vulnerability Scanning
description: Perform external vulnerability scans at least quarterly and after any significant change. Address findings and rescan to verify remediation.

title: Intrusion Detection/Prevention
description: Use intrusion-detection and/or intrusion-prevention techniques to detect and/or prevent intrusions into the network. Monitor all traffic at the perimeter and at critical points inside the CDE.

title: Information Security Awareness
description: Establish, document, and distribute security awareness program to make all personnel aware of the importance of cardholder data security.

title: Assignment of Information Security Responsibilities
description: Establish, document, and distribute information security responsibilities for all personnel.

title: Incident Response Plan
description: Establish, document, and implement an incident response plan to be initiated in the event of a system breach. Ensure the plan is tested annually.

title: Biometric Authentication for Access
description: Implement additional authentication controls for physical access to sensitive areas, such as biometric readers. (Applicable only to service providers)
